com.ca.codesv.protocols.transaction

Class TxnRepoStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ca.codesv.protocols.transaction.TxnRepoStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.ca.codesv.sdk.transaction.RepositoryStore

    public class TxnRepoStore
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.ca.codesv.sdk.transaction.RepositoryStore
    Transaction repository store that holds all loaded transaction workspaces. It is a singleton that is shared for the one run of the virtual server. This class can be interpreted as cache.
